text: Khto ye bilʹshe z·hubnyy nizh khto nahaduyutʹsya pro yikhni dokazy Lorda, todi disregard yim, bez toho, shchob zdiysnyuvaty shcho vony roblyatʹ. Otzhe, my rozmishchuyemo shchyty na yikhnikh serdenʹkakh zavazhyty yim z rozuminnya tse (Quran), ta deafness u yikhnikh vushrakh. Otzhe, niyaka materiya yaki vy shchob keruvaty nymy, vony budutʹ spromozhni nikoly kolysʹ keruvatysya
